TopicTitle: Can't enter/exit certain buildings, menu buttons don't work

Articles.Content:
After I installed 1.12.4 my game seems to be broken. I tried repairing the files through steam, reverting to 1.12.3, loading different save files, creating a new save and removing recently added mods but nothing seems to help. I can't enter the VAB/SPH and buildings like R&D won't let me leave their UI. The menu buttons stopped working so I can't quit to main menu either. I was able to load a quicksave but it wouldn't let me recover or go to the space center.

My logs:
https://1drv.ms/u/s!AqwDNW8Nrrpo9le9QmhwXKUXNQTx?e=RRvhfe

DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\PDLauncher\GameData\KerbalKonstructs\MapDecalMaps\AllBlack.png".

KSP looks for its files in the wrong directory. Did you try to bypass the launcher by setting the executable in Steam and not to a shortcut link?
It's fixed! Thank you very much, I hadn't seen this.
